description: Accommodating mountain hiking boot with a sensational fit, made from fine nubuck leather. With rubber heel and tip protection, very adaptive 3D tongue and super-soft heel collar. Waterproof thanks to a GORE-TEX membrane. The elastic GORE-TEX tongue construction and 3D Memo Foam provide additional comfort. The 2-zone lacing allows you to adjust the lacing to your individual needs and adapt to different situations. The tried-and-test Vibram sole guarantees stability and better grip on all surfaces. The sustainably produced terracare® leather and GORE-TEX footwear 3L are bluesign®-certified to protect our environment. Materials and components are 100% made in Europe. A classic hiking shoe in a modern design.
name: Mammut Trovat Advanced II High GTX - Mens

specs.value: Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
